import { Heading, VStack, Box } from "@chakra-ui/react" const About = () => { return ( About Us

LFG is a business networking platform tailored for the professional, creative and independent gaming community. Providing a space for creators and industry to showcase their work, network, and grow their business. Users will be able to post, share, and advertise their creations while integrating with popular social media platforms.

) } export default About;
